header.name: Alex Johnson

professionalSummary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years in the tech industry. Proven track record in designing, developing, and implementing complex software solutions. Adept at leading development teams and delivering projects on time and within budget.

education.details: Focus on artificial intelligence and machine learning.

education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering
education.details: Specialized in software development and project management.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Lead a team of 12 software engineers in developing scalable applications.
Manage project timelines and coordinate with cross-functional teams.
Designed and developed enterprise-level software solutions.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews.
Worked on developing and maintaining software applications.
Collaborated with product managers to define software requirements.
Participated in Agile development cycles and sprint planning.

projects.title: AI-Powered Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a recommendation system using machine learning algorithms to enhance user experience.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Microservices Platform
